channel.title: Teens Talk Sports
channel.description:
This podcast is for everyone who enjoys sports, comedy, and some clever teenagers who know what they're talking about. Based in New York, Josh and Jesse are two huge sports fans. They talk about everything from baseball to football, and cover sports news from coast to coast. Come check out Teens Talk Sports, a new, exciting podcast full of sports and fun!
Check Out Our New Website At: http://www.TeensTalkSports.com
Teens Talk Sports: SPORTS TALK FOR EVERYONE!
channel.itunes:subtitle: Sports Talk For Everyone!
channel.itunes:author: Josh and Jesse

item.title: Teens Talk Sports (January 20th, 2008)
item.description:
Teens Talk Sports is back! Listen for the new and exciting show as we take it to the next level! We discuss everything going on in sports this week, from the upcoming NFC and AFC Championship games, to the possible deportation of Miguel Tejada, and everything in between.
Tune in, You Won't Be Upset!

item.title: Teens Talk Sports (June 18, 2007)
item.description: After a two month hiatus, Teens Talk Sports is back! How sweet it is to hear Josh and Jesse through your speakers. Anyway, they're back talking mostly about the Subway Series between the Mets and Yankees. Along with baseball, there is some NBA Finals talk, along with much more. Teens Talk Sports, back and moving again!

item.title: Teens Talk Sports (April 19th 2007)
item.description: Teens Talk Sports is back in the mix of things. This week Teens Talk Sports brings up all the news that they've missed in the last week. Topics for this show include: the everlasting Imus in the Morning controversy, the new NFL schedule with the Superbowl being played at the University of Phoenix Stadium in Glendale, Arizona. Also discussed is Major League Baseball standings and team overviews. Teens Talk Sports also gets some NHL Hockey talk into the program along with the. Don't forget to check out http://www.teenstalksports.com for everything Teens Talk Sports, and make sure to tune in next week for another fun and exciting edition of Teens Talk Sports! Have a great week!

item.title: Teens Talk Sports (March 29 2007)
item.description: This week, Josh and Jesse are anticipating the first week of baseball! This week features a variety of sports news including Mark Prior’s injury, racist comments made by Micheal Ray Richardson, new rules for the NFL, and a body part that washed up on James Dolan’s property! Make sure to visit the official website at http://www.teenstalksports.com and send an email to podcast@teenstalksports.com to get your opinion out of your head and onto the show! Don’t forget to call the phone line at 206-203-0033 to leave a message for Josh and Jesse to hear. Have a great week!

item.title: Teens Talk Sports ( March 17th 2007)
item.description: This week, Josh and Jesse are back talking about a very diverse week of sports. Topics for this week’s show include NCAA March Madness, the Chris Simon NHL Suspension, baseball news and controversies, and the hiccup girl! Josh and Jesse even manage to touch on NASCAR! Make sure to visit Teens Talk Sports online at http://www.teenstalksports.com or email podcast@teenstalksports.com. Make sure to sign the new Guestbook on the website so you can join the Teens Talk Sports community! Have a great week and make sure to tune in next time for another great edition of Teens Talk Sports.

item.title: Teens Talk Sports (March 3, 2007)
item.description:
Jesse is back in the studio for this week's show! He rejoins Josh as they break down a pretty slow week of sports news. Topics discussed include spring trainnig, the Ohio Baseball Team bus accident, Jake Plummer, and the hiccup girl!
Make sure to try our weekly trivia question, because the person who is selected and answers the question correctly will get their own 5 minutes on the podcast next week!
Don't forget to check out our website at http://www.teenstalksports.com and send us an email at podcast@teenstalksports.com
Have a great week and enjoy the second week of baseball!

item.title: Teens Talk Sports ( February 26th 2007)
item.description: This week on Teens Talk Sports, Josh and Jesse anticipate the beginning of this year’s baseball season, with news on Spring Training, Barry Bonds, Manny Ramirez, and many more. Also discussed is some NBA news with the injury update of Dwayne Wade, and news on the NHL with the Sabres fight and fines. Check us out on the web at http://www.teenstalksports.com or drop us an email at podcast@teenstalksports.com. Also, leave us a phone message by dialing 206-203-0033 and give us a brief question or comment to be aired on the show. Have a great week and enjoy this year’s first baseball action!

item.title: Teens Talk Sports ( February 18th 2007)
item.description: Josh and Jesse are back this week with a brand new show! Hot topics discussed include the NBA All Star Game, the Bernie Williams and Roger Clemens situations, the beginning of Spring Training for baseball, and some talk about the Nissan Open in golf. And, can you believe it? They even have a meaningful conversation about the NHL and the early candidate for MVP! Tune in and believe it by visiting our website at http://www.teenstalksports.com or by subscribing to the podcast on iTunes. Also BRAND NEW this week is the Teens Talk Sports Discussion Board. Register so you can join our ever growing online community and discuss sports and the podcast with other sports fans around the country. Don’t forget to email us at podcast@teenstalksports.com or leave us a voice message by calling our studio line at 206-203-0033. We are back with another podcast next week, so until then: listen, enjoy, and have a great week

item.title: Teens Talk Sports (February 4th, 2007)
item.description:
This week, Josh and Jesse are talking about baseball! Finally, the 2007 MLB season is almost upon us, and the two teens take advantage of this by making their early predictions for division winners. Also included in this week’s show is lots of Super Bowl XLI news, NBA info, NHL news (for about 4 seconds), and we even get some K-Fed info in! Check us out on the web at http://www.teenstalksports.com, and drop us an email at podcast@teenstalksports.com
We have also just created our new Myspace page at: http://www.myspace.com/teenstalksports
Add us as a friend so you can get your Teens Talk Sports fill from Myspace! Also, don’t forget to leave us a voice message so you can get on the show at: 206-203-0033
Enjoy the show and have a great week!

item.title: Teens Talk Sports (January 26, 2007)
item.description:
Josh and Jesse are back talkin’ sports. This episode features their genius Super Bowl XLI predictions, along with many other stories in sports ranging from the NHL All Star Game to Sammy Sosa and other baseball news. Along with the new show is their brand new website: http://www.teenstalksports.com
Visit their website to find out more about the show and about Josh and Jesse themselves. They also have a new email address: podcast@teenstalksports.com
Also, you can reach them on the telephone line by calling 206-203-0033. Ask them a question, make fun of them, anything will do. If you call, you will be on the air: so anyone who has ever dreamed of being famous, THIS IS YOUR CHANCE!
Also, expect a new show to appear next Saturday, February 3rd, with updated Super Bowl information, along with all of your other sports news. Enjoy!
UPDATE: We are Having TWO Live Superbowl Shows on Sunday streaming on the web. Check Back For Updates on How To Listen and be Part of the Show! They Will become Avalible to Podcast soon after.
To DOWNLOAD This Program Put Your Mouse Cursor Over DOWNLOAD, Then RIGHT CLICK. Slide The Cursor Down To SAVE TARGET AS And Then CLICK.... Now Just Decide WHERE You Want To Download The File To And CLICK SAVE.

item.title: Teens Talk Sports (January 20th 2007)
item.description:
Josh and Jesse are here for their first "REAL" episode as they tackle the current sports issues at hand. Such things covered by the two this week include: the AFC and NFC Championship games, some baseball talk, Josh and Jesse's usual antics, and of course, your calls. This week we featured one caller as our "Loser Caller of the Month"; and this will become a recurrent feature on the podcast.
Next week features a special Super Bowl XI Preview Show, complete with your calls and e-mails. Make sure to send us a message so you can get in on the fun!
E-mail- joshandjesseshow@yahoo.com joshandjesseshow@podomatic.com
Telephone Comment Line- 206-203-0033
Check out New Website http://TeensTalkSports.com
To DOWNLOAD This Program Put Your Mouse Cursor Over DOWNLOAD, Then RIGHT CLICK. Slide The Cursor Down To SAVE TARGET AS And Then CLICK.... Now Just Decide WHERE You Want To Download The File To And CLICK SAVE.
